title: "About"
---

::: {.content-block}

Publication information is fetched using various APIs:

- General info: [Orcid](https://orcid.org)
- General info: [CrossRef](https://www.crossref.org)
- General info, TL;DR: [Semantic Scholar](https://www.semanticscholar.org)
- Attention metrics: [Altmetrics](https://www.altmetric.com)
- Open-access info: [Unpaywall](https://unpaywall.org)
- BibTeX references: [doi2bib](https://www.doi2bib.org)

The backend was written in Python. The frontend uses [Quarto](https://quarto.org).

:::
